question: How do I reset my password?
answer: To reset your password, navigate to your account settings, click on 'Security', and then select 'Reset Password'. You will receive a confirmation link via email.

question: How can I become a seller?
answer: To register as a seller, go to the homepage and click on 'Become a Seller'. Complete the registration form, upload required documents, and wait for approval from our team.

question: How do I track my order?
answer: Log in to your account and go to the 'My Orders' section. Each order will display its current status along with a tracking link if the order has been shipped.

question: What payment methods do you accept?
answer: We support multiple payment options including credit/debit cards (Visa, Mastercard), JazzCash, Easypaisa, and direct bank transfers.

question: Can I edit my review after submission?
answer: Unfortunately, editing submitted reviews is currently not supported. If you need to make changes, please contact our customer support team with your request.

question: What is your return and refund policy?
answer: We offer a 7-day return policy on most items. To initiate a return, go to 'My Orders', select the item, and click 'Request Return'. Refunds are processed within 5–7 business days after item verification.

question: How do I contact customer support?
answer: You can reach our customer support via the chatbot, the 'Help Center', or by emailing support@yourdomain.com. Live chat is available 9 AM to 9 PM (Mon–Sat).

question: Why was my order cancelled automatically?
answer: Orders may be cancelled automatically if payment is not confirmed within the allotted time, or if the seller fails to confirm shipment. You’ll receive a full refund in such cases.

question: Is Cash on Delivery (COD) available?
answer: Yes, we offer Cash on Delivery for selected products and cities. This option will be visible at checkout if it’s available for your area.

question: How do I update my shipping address?
answer: To update your shipping address, go to 'Profile > Addresses' and click 'Edit'. You can also add new addresses during checkout.

question: How do I submit a product review?
answer: After your order is delivered, go to 'My Orders' > click on the delivered product > 'Write a Review'.

question: Where can I view my cart?
answer: Click on the cart icon in the navbar or go to 'Dashboard > Cart' to view items you've added.

question: How do I update my profile information?
answer: Navigate to 'Dashboard > Settings'. You can update your full name, address, ID, gender, DOB, and more.

question: Can I cancel my order?
answer: You can cancel an order before it is confirmed by the seller. Go to 'My Orders', select the pending order, and click 'Cancel'.

question: How does the wishlist work?
answer: You can save products to your wishlist by clicking the heart icon. Access it via 'Dashboard > Wishlist'.

question: What are the order statuses?
answer: Order statuses include: Pending, Confirmed, Shipped, Delivered, and Cancelled. You can view these in 'My Orders'.

question: How do I upload a product as a seller?
answer: Go to 'Seller Dashboard > Add Product', fill in the form with product details, upload images, and submit.

question: How can I edit or delete my product?
answer: In the seller dashboard, go to 'My Products', select the product, and click 'Edit' or 'Delete'.

question: Where can I see reviews for my products?
answer: In your seller dashboard, go to 'Product Reviews' to see customer feedback on your listed items.

question: Can I assign a courier for an order?
answer: Only admins can assign couriers. Once assigned, the courier will update the delivery status from their dashboard.

question: How do couriers update delivery status?
answer: Couriers can go to 'Courier Dashboard > Assigned Orders', and click 'Update Status' after completing delivery.

question: How can I log in?
answer: Click the login button on the top right, and enter your email and password. Admins can also use Google login.

question: What happens after I confirm an order?
answer: Once confirmed, the admin assigns a courier. You’ll receive updates as the product is shipped and delivered.
